intro: Psydrax suborbicularis, commonly known as the broad-leafed Psychotria, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many species with showy flowers and medicinal properties. The plant features opposite, ovate leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Its flowers are small, clustered in dense inflorescences, and typically have five petals. It is valued in traditional medicine for its potential pharmacological compounds.
